0.text: Bug 117380  SVG Graphic  Context does not support drawString.

1.text: The SVG Graphics2D class does not support the drawString method.

2.text: This is necessary to render charts.

3.text: A renderer exception is thrown when trying to render the test case stock chart.

4.text: I will attach the test case that causes this problem.

5.text: I have a fix in hand and tested the fix and it works.

6.text: I want to know if I should check this fix in 2.0.0 M3 or for the 2.0.0 Final driver.

7.text: I think we should check this in the M3 driver since it won't cause any regression problems.
